Why Choose Our Signal Boosters

Enhanced Signal Strength

Boost your signal by up to 32x, ensuring clear calls and fast data in previously weak coverage areas.

CE Certified Quality

All our boosters are CE certified and comply with international safety and performance standards.

Easy Installation

Simple setup with comprehensive instructions and support. Most systems can be installed in under an hour.

Expert Support

Our technical team is available 7 days a week to help with selection, installation, and troubleshooting.

Frequently Asked Questions

Signal boosters work by capturing the existing outdoor signal with an external antenna, amplifying it with a booster unit, and then redistributing the enhanced signal inside your building through an internal antenna. This creates a stronger, more reliable signal for all devices within range.

Most of our signal boosters are designed to work with multiple networks simultaneously. However, some models are optimized for specific carriers. Our product descriptions clearly indicate which networks are supported. If you need coverage for multiple carriers, look for our multi-band boosters that support all major UK networks.

Most customers experience a significant improvement in signal strength, typically 3-5 bars where they previously had 0-1 bars. The exact improvement depends on the strength of the outdoor signal, the type of building materials, and the specific booster model. Our boosters can improve signal strength by up to 32 times, which translates to clearer calls, fewer dropped connections, and faster data speeds.

Yes, all our signal boosters are fully legal and compliant with UK regulations. They are CE certified and meet all the requirements set by Ofcom. Our boosters are designed to work without interfering with other devices or networks, ensuring they operate within legal parameters.
